record.description: You can't tell the campus from the farm what with University of Chicago co-eds going in for rural fashions. Blue denim jeans are the outstanding feature of feminine "barnyard" fashions now in favor at the University of Chicago worn three-quarter length like Senior Ruddy Hale (standing), or rolled above the knees as favored by Sophomore Phyllis Pfaelzer, and Freshman Pat Stone.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
